meanings.definition: A period of instruction given by a tutor to an individual or small group.
meanings.sent1: During the tutorials, the tutor explained math problems to the students.
meanings.sent2: I watched a helpful tutorial on how to bake a cake.
meanings.sent3: The tutorials were so engaging that the students didn't want to leave.
meanings.sent4: The tutorials were like a beacon of knowledge in the sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The tutorials were like a treasure trove of learning waiting to be explored.

meanings.definition: A book, film, or other work that provides instruction on a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: The tutorials on coding were very informative and easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: She borrowed a tutorial on photography from the library.
meanings.sent3: The tutorial she read on gardening made her laugh at its simplicity.
meanings.sent4: The tutorial was a lighthouse guiding her through the complex topic.
meanings.sent5: The tutorial was a key unlocking the secrets of the subject.

meanings.definition: A class in which a tutor gives intensive instruction in some subject.
meanings.sent1: The tutorials in chemistry helped the students understand the concepts better.
meanings.sent2: I signed up for a tutorial in Spanish to improve my language skills.
meanings.sent3: The tutorial in history was so intense that the students felt like they were in a movie.
meanings.sent4: The tutorial was a rocket launching the students into the world of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The tutorial was a bridge connecting the students to new learning opportunities.
